channel.title: Chat doesn't wrap in the final scoreboard screen
channel.description:
#### What happened?
I typed something long. It got cut off when displayed.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Either wrap, or constrain the input box so that you can't overtype (preferably former).
#### Steps to reproduce:
Type something long at end of game, hit enter.
#### Comments:
See screenshot:
https://i.imgur.com/rQm13YZ.jpg

item.title: Chat doesn't wrap in the final scoreboard screen
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
It also doesn’t scroll down automatically from what I’ve seen.

You have to manually advance it, then it usually works after that.
